Detailed Description

HSS1394 namespace encapsulates all HSS1394 functionality.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum hss1394::THSS1394Tags

Message tags used in HSS1394 protocol.

Enumerator:
kUserData  Data is 'user' data to be delivered to app.
kDebugData  Data is for debug channel.
kUserTagBase  Base of user special tag space.
kUserTagTop  Top of user special tag space.
kReset  Reset node message.
kChangeAddress  Change address message tag.
kPing  Ping message tag. Reply is a kPingResponse packet.
kPingResponse  Ping response packet tag.
kEchoAsUserData  Debug tag. Echo data back 'as-if' sent from node.
kUndefined  Undefined tag.
